content:
That's wonderful to hear! It's great that Luna took to the new litter box so easily, and it's even better that it's made a big difference for you too!

It's amazing how much of a game-changer a simple thing like an automated litter box can be, isn't it? The convenience, the reduced smell, the extra time you get back in your day... it all adds up to a big win!

And I love that you're using the extra time to focus on brushing Luna more frequently! She's one lucky kitty to have such a dedicated and caring owner like you.

By the way, have you noticed any other benefits to the automated litter box, like reduced litter tracking or less mess around the house?
